description.value:
Trigger The doors to area E3 are opened without someone making blood offerings and lighting the lanterns.

Effect Every creature in area E2 must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:32|traits:damaging-effect] save.

Critical Success The creature takes no damage.

Success The creature takes @Damage[(3d10+13)[cold]] damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stupefied]{Stupefied 1} for 1 minute.

Failure The creature takes @Damage[(6d10+27)[cold]] damage and is stupefied 1.

Critical Failure The creature takes @Damage[(6d10+27)[cold]] damage, takes @Damage[1d10[persistent,cold]] damage, and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stupefied]{Stupefied 2}.

details.description: Freezing black fire bursts from the two quartz altars, filling the room with numbing black flames that scour away memories and emotions as swiftly as they sear flesh and bone.
details.disable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:30] (master) to sever the links between the door and the lanterns, @Check[type:religion|dc:35] (master) to use prayer to deactivate the divine magic, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Dispel Magic] (6th level; counteract DC 30) to counteract the trap
details.reset: The trap resets one minute after the doors to area E3 are closed.
